website_summaries.verdict: With 6" numbers and high-contrast colors, you'll never have to repeat the score again!
pros: Scores each game up to 99 points for each side
2.5" period counter up to 5 for versatility in sporting activities
Easy to flip numbers, but doesn't tip easily
cons: Not good for baseball or other sports with innings, since game digit does not go up to 9

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Use this once a week for a group of adult men's basketball. Lifesaver in keeping score because it can easily get switched around when people are trying to keep track in their head. The board is large at about a couple feet wide and quality is better than expected. The number seem to be made of a strong vinyl and have held up very well. Even though the size was larger than I imagined it is still very portable which we need because we set up and tear down all supplies we bring each week. The numbers are large enough to be seen from any place on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: We use this scorekeeper primarily for rally point scoring in pickleball matches. Great tool Update to original review. We have been using the scorekeeper for over a year now. It has stood up to all the outdoor weather issues we have in Southern AZ. It is showing no signs of deterioration and wind issues blowing the numbers around have been none existent. Would highly recommend this aid for scorekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: NPB

customer_reviews.title: My boys use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two boys for Christmas. They were so excited! They carry it to the basement, upstairs, outside, and to their rooms. They use it to keep score for basketball, football, or any other game they come up with at that time. I think they have used it every day since they opened it up on Christmas day! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3Boys

customer_reviews.title: Just what the coach needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it looks great, as expected. I've been using these for youth Lacrosse games so I know it will work out. My plan is to make custom labels to go over the "Home" and "Guest" spaces because the teams don't always sit on the corresponding sides of the score board and then the fans across the field have to work it out in their heads. I'm probably just going to make some black arrows on white backgrounds to point to either side. I wonder why the manufacturer doesn't just go that way?
customer_reviews.author: Bob V

customer_reviews.title: Great size and height
customer_reviews.text: We needed this item for our 7 on 7 football games. Great size and height. Item was sent very quickly. This is a well made item; and I know we will be using it for years. Nice price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline L

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors better
customer_reviews.text: Exact same product as the SKLZ scorekeeper but for a lot less. I like the colors better, too. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Mesa Youth Sports

customer_reviews.title: Scorekeeper is a good product
customer_reviews.text: We use our scorekeeper for outdoor volleyball and the quality and price are both a big factor for me. I have purchased my scorekeeper 2 years ago and heavily used all year round for 4 seasons. Will purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ihpfcc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our school volleyball, outdoor soccer or flag football games!
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel06

customer_reviews.title: They love them! No more remembering scores
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my husband's bocce team. They love them! No more remembering scores. Now they just have to remember to flip the scoreboard!
customer_reviews.author: Quiltbat

customer_reviews.title: Good for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We use this scoreboard quite a bit for our school. Overall good quality, and I would have given 5 stars, but the main black frame is made out of particle board, and the corner has been worn and gotten chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Well made score keeper
customer_reviews.text: Well made! I like how it folds (and how it's made in terms of the hinges etc.) Looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Alloriginaltone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our students and PE teacher love this tool. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carden School Of Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING - these have radically changed how we score games. If you get tired of asking for the score - this is the answer and you can see big numbers from further away.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel
customer_reviews.text: This scorekeeper really comes in handy, especially if the electronic scoreboard goes out. Good to have in case of aemergency.
customer_reviews.author: Inspired

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The service was excellence I received the product practical over night it was pack neatly and the cards were everything I hope for and some unfolds easily and stand up well
customer_reviews.author: LARRY J BILLINGSLEA

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Scoreboard on the Go
customer_reviews.text: Works how it's intended - easy to read and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: MT Hockey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, easy to store and transport. This is a perfect solution for youth camps and weekly pickup games.
customer_reviews.author: amazonThunder

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to see.
customer_reviews.text: We use this at Lacrosse games outside. It stays put on the scorekeepers table and Is not too bothered by the wind. Can see from across the field.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, kind of heavy, but it should last.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for all kinds of sports and the vinyl can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our softball league. Its a good product. The only thing I would change about it is adding a day to keep the numbers where they are suppose to be for windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Dani & Chris

customer_reviews.title: SCOREBOARDDDDDDD!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a scoreboard. What are you looking for here. Something like 'study, but could collapse pretty easy if a man crashes into it.' Works great for my men's league and the numbers don't fall off easily like others I've used like this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect scoreboard for any game, any time, any where. Super durable, easy to use, just perfect for every situation.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for indorrs and outdoors use. Now that my company has it, neither side teams can cheat points.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. De Cuba

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The numbers are large and easy to read to across the field. We use it for H.S. Lacrosse games where we have no electric at the field. Folds up and has a carry handle. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuddy

customer_reviews.title: This only goes up to 5 for the period/game section ...
customer_reviews.text: This only goes up to 5 for the period/game section so it is not compatible for all sports (baseball/softball/kickball etc)
customer_reviews.author: barbara nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: For a flip scoreboard, it serves the purpose just fine... Like the fold up design and the numbers are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Doehler

customer_reviews.title: High quality and visibility
customer_reviews.text: This manual scorekeeper is of very high quality and surprisingly, far exceeded my expectations. In contrast to other products, the numbers are large enough to be highly visible for our girls lacrosse games.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: We would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: A nice portable unit for the cost. Sits on a table and is easy to operate and read the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: don franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It Filled the need. It is Good quality. Use it 703176065for basketball games and it works very well
customer_reviews.author: William W Gilbert II

customer_reviews.title: Manual scorekeeper
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how durable it is. We use it in our flag football league not only for the score but for the downs as well. It's a hut with everyone in the league
customer_reviews.author: Señor goodnews

customer_reviews.title: package was good
customer_reviews.text: not bad! but the numbers should be on both sides of the board so that it can be read from all angles.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie in a bottle

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: the product deteriorates rapidly, its structure is not optimal, the material of the numbers stick out the wires and damaged if not taken extreme measures generally a bad investment, this is the price one pays for not playing by hands on the product before buying it, BAD PRODUCT...... I AM VENEZUELAN volleyball tournament organizer sport united in Caracas twitter: @updvoleibol facebook: Upd Voleibol
customer_reviews.author: Javier Franco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I needed something to keep track of the score when we play Basketball or soccer, this is PERFECT! No issues, easy set-up, honestly couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. If you use outside the wind causes ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. If you use outside the wind causes issues.
customer_reviews.author: David Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good item. I wish the numbers would not flip with the air other than that it's a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what we needed...durable and well made. Graphics made the scoreboard easy to read from across the court!
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, quality portable scoreboard and was perfect for what I was needing for my 5th grade basketball team.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Small

product_meta.title: Outfield Fencing 150' Roll
product_meta.description: Composed of durable polyethylene square mesh material. This is an ideal material for use as a stand alone outfield fence when combined with the Smartpole staking system. Finished rolls are 48"H x 150'L. Specify Color.
feature_bullets: Scores game up to 99 for each side
